title: Keizo Takemi, Author at The Global Governance Project

organizations.name: House of Councillors of the Japanese Diet
quotes: Keizo Takemi is a member of the House of Councillors of the Japanese Diet, and a member of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party.

organizations.name: Liberal Democratic Party
quotes: Keizo Takemi is a member of the House of Councillors of the Japanese Diet, and a member of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party.

organizations.name: World Health Organization
quotes: He is also the World Health Organization’s Goodwill Ambassador for Universal Health Coverage.

organizations.name: Harvard School of Public Health
quotes: Senator Takemi was a research fellow at the Harvard School of Public Health and has played several important roles at the United Nations, including as a member of the High Level Panel on UN System-Wide Coherence in Areas of Development, Humanitarian Assistance and Environment

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: Senator Takemi was a research fellow at the Harvard School of Public Health and has played several important roles at the United Nations, including as a member of the High Level Panel on UN System-Wide Coherence in Areas of Development, Humanitarian Assistance and Environment

organizations.name: High Level Panel on UN System-Wide Coherence in Areas of Development, Humanitarian Assistance and Environment
quotes: Senator Takemi was a research fellow at the Harvard School of Public Health and has played several important roles at the United Nations, including as a member of the High Level Panel on UN System-Wide Coherence in Areas of Development, Humanitarian Assistance and Environment (appointed by Kofi Annan)

organizations.name: UN High Level Commission on Health Employment and Economic Growth
quotes: and the UN High Level Commission on Health Employment and Economic Growth (appointed by Ban Ki-moon).
